opinion:
542 U.S. 935

NORFOLK SOUTHERN RAILWAY CO.
v.
JAMES N. KIRBY, PTY LTD., DBA KIRBY ENGINEERING, ET AL.

C. A. 11th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 540 U. S. 1099.] Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
